meanings.definition: Convert into or express in the form of currency.
meanings.sent1: She monetised her artwork by selling it at the market.
meanings.sent2: The company monetised its online platform through advertisements.
meanings.sent3: The idea of turning old toys into currency was so monetised!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity monetised the mundane into gold.
meanings.sent5: He monetised his skills, turning them into a profitable business.

meanings.definition: Make money from (an asset, business, or process).
meanings.sent1: They monetised their property by renting it out to tourists.
meanings.sent2: The entrepreneur monetised his innovative idea successfully.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to catch mice was surprisingly monetised by the owner.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for baking monetised into a thriving bakery.
meanings.sent5: The musician monetised his talent by performing at local events.
